title: No move to utilize military against peaceful protests: Defence Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Defence emphasizes that there is no need to utilize the military in an unnecessary manner against peaceful protestors.
In a release, the Defence Secretary has acknowledged the Facebook post which was penned down by Field Marshal Sarath Fonseka with regard to the issue.

Moreover, the Ministry of Defence has stated that all social media claims regarding the military being utilized to cause a tense situation at peaceful protests is false, and the Army will remain loyal to the constitution and the people of the country, in addition to granting their assistance only when requested by the Police.
